content: Store medication in a lock box
There are many styles of medication lock boxes. The idea is that you keep your medication inside the box and lock it, making it more difficult to access medication when you are experiencing a crisis.
Purchase a medication lock box. Only take out a limited amount of medication at a time (e.g., enough pills for one day or one week).
